name: UNDER2ALE
description: This top-secret game prototype has made its way all the way from the deepest depths of Area 51 onto Itch.io! That's right folks, Undertale 2 is REAL, but the government has been trying to keep it from the public. A team of the most elite computer hackers on the planet have managed to get their hands on a prototype copy, and thanks to their efforts, you too can play the most anticipated video game in human history!
